attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The vast numbers of traffic wardens on our streets are a ready made uniform presence simple give them all the same uniform and powers and you will have tripled the amount of PCSO on the streets

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Saferstreets/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
